languages.text: "И в каком же грехе ты будешь каяться?" {n}На костистом лице возникает интерес, уголок губ ползет вниз в кривой ухмылке.{/n} "Он меня напугает?"

traits.locale_text: "И в каком же грехе ты будешь каяться?" {n}На костистом лице возникает интерес, уголок губ ползет вниз в кривой ухмылке.{/n} "Он меня напугает?"

languages.text: "And what misdeed will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks in the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"
languages.original_text: "И в каком же грехе ты будешь каяться?" {n}На костистом лице возникает интерес, уголок губ ползет вниз в кривой ухмылке.{/n} "Он меня напугает?"

traits.locale_text: "And what sin will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks on the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"
"And what sin will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks on the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"
"And what sin will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks in the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"
"And what sin will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks in the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"
"And what misdeed will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks in the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"

languages.text: “那么，你又要忏悔怎样的过错呢？”{n}那张瘦骨嶙峋的脸上露出了好奇之意。他垂下了嘴角，露出了歪歪扭扭的笑容。{/n}“会吓我一跳吗？”
languages.original_text: "And what misdeed will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks in the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"

traits.locale_text: “那么，你又要忏悔怎样的罪行呢？”{n}那张瘦骨嶙峋的脸上露出了好奇之意。他垂下了嘴角，露出了歪歪扭扭的笑容。{/n}“会吓我一跳吗？”

languages.text: «¿Y qué afrenta desea confesar?» {n}Su delgado rostro denota, de pronto, una gran curiosidad, a la que acompaña una sonrisa torcida. {/n} «¿Debería temer su respuesta?».
languages.original_text: "And what misdeed will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks in the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué pecado desea confesar?» {n}Su delgado rostro denota, de pronto, una gran curiosidad, a la que acompaña una sonrisa torcida. {/n} «¿Debería temer su respuesta?».

languages.text: 「はて、どのような過ちを告白するつもりでしょうか？」{n}骨ばった顔に好奇心が芽生え、口角が下がり、ゆがんだ笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「私を脅しているのですか？」
languages.original_text: "And what misdeed will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks in the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"

traits.locale_text: 「はて、どのような過ちを告白するつもりでしょうか？」{n}骨ばった顔に好奇心が芽生え、口角が下がり、ゆがんだ笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「私を脅しているのですか？」

languages.text: "Und welche Missetat werdet Ihr beichten?" {n}Sein knochiges Gesicht wirkt neugierig, als seine Mundwinkel sich zu einem verschlagenen Grinsen verziehen.{/n} "Wird sie mir Angst machen?"
languages.original_text: "And what misdeed will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks in the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"

traits.locale_text: "Und welche Sünde werdet Ihr dabei beichten?" {n}Sein knochiges Gesicht wirkt neugierig, als seine Mundwinkel sich zu einem verschlagenen Grinsen verziehen.{/n} "Wird sie mir Angst machen?"

languages.text: « Et quel manquement confesserez-vous ? » {n}Vous remarquez une étincelle de curiosité sur son visage osseux, alors que le coin de sa bouche s'abaisse pour former un sourire narquois.{/n} « Va-t-il me faire trembler d'effroi ? »
languages.original_text: "And what misdeed will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks in the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"

traits.locale_text: « Et quel péché confesserez-vous ? » {n}Vous remarquez une étincelle de curiosité sur son visage osseux, alors que le coin de sa bouche s'abaisse pour former un sourire narquois.{/n} « Va-t-il me faire trembler d'effroi ? »

languages.text: "Hangi hatalarının günahını çıkartacaksın peki?" {n}Adamın dudakları çarpık bir sırıtışla bükülürken kemikli yüzüne merak yayılıyor.{/n} "Beni korkutacak bir şeylerin mi?"
languages.original_text: "And what misdeed will you be confessing?" {n}Curiosity sparks in the bony face as the corner of his mouth lowers in a crooked smirk.{/n} "Will it frighten me?"

traits.locale_text: "Peki ne tip yanlışlarının günahını çıkartacaksın?" {n}Kemikli yüzüne merak yayılıyor ve dudaklarının kenarında çarpık bir gülümseme oluşuyor.{/n} "Beni korkutacak bir şeyler mi?"
